entry.title: Hello 2021: UK | YouTube NYE Big Night in with Behzinga, Yungblud, Naomi and more!

media:group.media:title: Hello 2021: UK | YouTube NYE Big Night in with Behzinga, Yungblud, Naomi and more!
media:group.media:description:
Tune in on Thursday, 31st December, at 10:30pm (GMT) till late. Admission free.
Party it up big time with Hello 2021: UK - an unmissable New Year’s Eve with YouTube, right in your living room. There’ll be exclusive performances from Dua Lipa, Joel Corry and MNEK, Aitch and AJ Tracey, and Anne-Marie. Plus, you’ll see your favourite personalities like Behzinga, Calfreezy, WillNE, Big Narstie, and Katherine Ryan – along with some special guests.
Say goodbye to 2020, and Hello 2021.
Appearances include:
Adrian Bliss Aitch AJ Tracey Anne-Marie Behzinga Big Narstie Calfreezy Cassette Boy Chabuddy G DJ Beats Dua Lipa Ellie White Holly H Humza Productions Jessica Kellgren-Fozard Joe Wicks Joel Corry Katherine Ryan MC Grindah Michaela Coel MNEK Naomi Campbell Natasia Demetriou Nigel NG Novympia Olivia Neill Raye RuPaul WillNE Yammy Plus special guests
All applicable COVID-19 protocols were implemented during the recording of this show.

media:group.media:title: Hello 2021 Americas | YouTube NYE Celebration
media:group.media:description:
Celebrate the most anticipated New Year in modern history with YouTube’s Hello 2021; a virtual celebration featuring J Balvin, Dua Lipa, YG, Karol G, Emma Chamberlain, Dude Perfect, Demi Lovato, hosts Juanpa Zurita and Storm Reid and more. Set a reminder! 🔔
12/31 at 10:30pm ET / 7:30pm PT
Other appearances:
Matthew McConaughey Larray RuPaul D'Amelio Family Kane Brown Marques Brownlee Brad Mondo ZHC Dolan Twins and more!
We’re as excited as you are. Let’s give 2020 an enthusiastic sendoff! 🎉 🎊
All applicable COVID-19 protocols were implemented during the recording of this show.
-------
Celebra este neuvo año con el especial de YouTube Hello 2021. Una celebración virtual con J Balvin, Dua Lipa, Karol G, Demi Lobato y más celebridades. Conducido por Juanpa Zurita y Storm Reid. ¡Activa el recordatorio! 🔔
31 de diciembre a las 9:30pm México / 10:30pm Colombia y Perú / 12:30am Argentina y Chile
Otras celebridades:
Matthew McConaughey Larray RuPaul D'Amelio Family Kane Brown Marques Brownlee Brad Mondo ZHC Dolan Twins y más
Estamos tan entusiasmados como tu. ¡Despidamos juntos el 2020! 🎉 🎊
Todos los protocolos COVID-19 se implementaron durante la grabación de este programa.
#YouTubeNYE #Hello2021

entry.title: Hello 2021 Americas | YouTube NYE Celebration (Official Trailer)

media:group.media:title: Hello 2021 Americas | YouTube NYE Celebration (Official Trailer)
media:group.media:description:
Set a reminder: https://youtu.be/OK_ChvMo1BQ
Ring in the most anticipated New Year with YouTube’s Hello 2021: Americas - an exclusive virtual celebration featuring Dua Lipa, J Balvin, Emma Chamberlain, Dude Perfect, YG, Demi Lovato and more! Join hosts Juanpa Zurita and Storm Reid on December 31st at 10:30pm ET / 7:30pm PT for an evening filled with exclusive performances and all-star guests, say Hello 2021!
#YouTubeNYE #Hello2021

entry.title: Barack Obama on Family, Music, Science and Good Leadership | BookTube

media:group.media:title: Barack Obama on Family, Music, Science and Good Leadership | BookTube
media:group.media:description:
President Barack Obama joins our close community of readers to reflect on the experiences documented in his new memoir, A Promised Land. In this special episode of BookTube, President Obama responds to questions from creators Mark Rober, LaGuardia Cross, Marques Brownlee, Team2Moms, and Twins the New Trend on topics ranging from science, music, leadership, fatherhood, and more.
0:00 Introduction 1:02 Mark Rober 6:20 La Guardia Cross 10:20 Marques Brownlee 12:38 Denise & Ebony Nuñez 17:05 Fred & Tim Williams

entry.title: Creator Spotlights | Official Trailer | YouTube Originals

media:group.media:title: Creator Spotlights | Official Trailer | YouTube Originals
media:group.media:description:
The Creator Spotlight series turns its focus onto four huge YouTube stars. Deestroying, Kristopher London, Mr. Kate, and Shalom Blac are each going on a unique journey that will show a side of themselves their fans have never seen before. Discover the creators you love in a brand new light!
Deestroying - https://youtu.be/Ia7K72uOV4k Shalom Blac - https://youtu.be/YC9gtSuudgM Kristopher London - https://youtu.be/doI-Pm5bOl0 Mr. Kate - https://youtu.be/Dta-1xwih_A

entry.title: Soledad O’Brien Talks Criminal Justice Reform | Bear Witness, Take Action 2

media:group.media:title: Soledad O’Brien Talks Criminal Justice Reform | Bear Witness, Take Action 2
media:group.media:description:
Soledad O’Brien talks to Derrick Johnson and Gina Clayton-Johnson about criminal justice reform. Is it possible to change the infrastructure or are we fated to live in the same system forever? Is the phrase “Defund The Police” so misleading that people who would agree with it if they understood what it meant are instead voting against it? This conversation breaks down what you need to know about how we’re being failed – and how to raise the heat.
Watch the full livestream of #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs
The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: A Conversation About LGBTQ+ And Race | Bear Witness, Take Action 2

media:group.media:title: A Conversation About LGBTQ+ And Race | Bear Witness, Take Action 2
media:group.media:description:
Karamo Brown, Arrow, and Kierra Johnson sit down to discuss LGBTQ+ issues of the movement. Cultural, sexual, and racial issues are all part of the lively conversation that dares to both openly confront the system and its state-sanctioned violence and how LGBTQ+ people are disproportionately affected.
Watch the full livestream of #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs
The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: Soledad O’Brien Talks To Isabel Wilkerson | Bear Witness, Take Action 2

media:group.media:title: Soledad O’Brien Talks To Isabel Wilkerson | Bear Witness, Take Action 2
media:group.media:description:
Soledad O’Brien talks to Isabel Wilkerson about her book “Caste: The Origins of Our Discontents” and everything that means for race in America. This brief but intense conversation touches upon what it means to live as a black person in modern America, interracial marriage, and the perils of white entitlement.
Watch the full livestream of #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs
The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: Putting Thoughts Into Action | Bear Witness, Take Action 2

media:group.media:title: Putting Thoughts Into Action | Bear Witness, Take Action 2
media:group.media:description:
What can you do right now to affect your movement? This clip is chock full of ideas that everyone can use – whether you’re in school or at work – to help move their agendas forward. From Deepak Chopra to Malcolm Jenkins, there are some amazing voices here with truly brilliant ideas to inspire. Raise. The. Heat!
Watch the full livestream of #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: Bear Witness, Take Action 2 - Continuing the Conversation on Racial Injustice

media:group.media:title: Bear Witness, Take Action 2 - Continuing the Conversation on Racial Injustice
media:group.media:description:
The conversation has begun - and now it’s headed for the next level. More artists and activists than ever are joining in to discuss and confront the issue of race in America. #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: Continuing the Movement, hosted by Common & Keke Palmer.
Watch the other YouTube creator mini docs in this series that cover a wide range of important and topical subjects and experiences: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X4Ccgjh5Cjs&list=PLjq6DwYksrzxVCT-Kh6NWV2EzZSTrpkDQ

media:group.media:title: DeRay McKesson Talks Criminal Justice
media:group.media:description:
In partnership with YouTube Originals’ #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: Continuing The Movement.
DeRay McKesson tackles the criminal justice system and focuses on three distinct ways in which to improve it - from police violence, to the felony theft threshold, to no-knock raids.
We’ve marched. We’ve cried out for justice. We’ve raised our voices. What’s next? Join Common & Keke Palmer for #BearWitnessTakeAction 2: Continuing The Movement on December 5th. It’s time to raise the heat.
Set a Reminder: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs
Watch the other YouTube creator mini docs in this series that cover a wide range of important and topical subjects and experiences: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X4Ccgjh5Cjs&list=PLjq6DwYksrzxVCT-Kh6NWV2EzZSTrpkDQ
The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: BWTA Radio hosted by Storm Reid as “DJ Jus-T-Ice. @StormReid

media:group.media:title: BWTA Radio hosted by Storm Reid as “DJ Jus-T-Ice. @StormReid
media:group.media:description:
Storm Reid joins the ranks of #Bear WitnessTakeAction 2 to discuss policy change, injustice, and calls for new leadership. She’s joined by actor Asante Blackk and together they talk about those crucial next steps and what’s needed to take them. It’s time to raise the heat.
Set a Reminder: https://youtu.be/X4Ccgjh5Cjs
Watch the other YouTube creator mini docs in this series that cover a wide range of important and topical subjects and experiences: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X4Ccgjh5Cjs&list=PLjq6DwYksrzxVCT-Kh6NWV2EzZSTrpkDQ
The views and opinions expressed in this documentary are those of the participants and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any YouTube/Google entity.

entry.title: How to Create a Hilarious & Challenging Gift Wrap! l The Great Gift Exchange!

media:group.media:title: How to Create a Hilarious & Challenging Gift Wrap! l The Great Gift Exchange!
media:group.media:description: In this extended, step-by-step tutorial from The Great Gift Exchange, Alex Wassabi creates the most challenging wrap ever by using plaster, duct tape and a miniature basketball game!

entry.title: How to Create Ugly Sweater & Tuxedo Gift Wraps for Your Holiday Parties! l The Great Gift Exchange!

media:group.media:title: How to Create Ugly Sweater & Tuxedo Gift Wraps for Your Holiday Parties! l The Great Gift Exchange!
media:group.media:description: In this extended, step-by-step tutorial from The Great Gift Exchange, Amber Whittington of Amber’s Closet learns how to wrap a present like an ugly sweater, and using the same techniques, how to dress it up like a tuxedo!
